title: Rito Is run by a bunch of %%%%s.
body: BAnned for no reason. Won't give me any proof to show why theyre stealing 7-800$ of my money. And basically tells me to fuck off. They can't possibly have proof that I cheated in any way, because I never have cheated in any way. Bunch of fuckin keyboard warriors that copy and paste bullshit answers to questions I didn't ask.

replies.body:
Erroneous bans for 3rd party manipulation have happened once in a long while, but cursing out Riot isn't going to help you recover from it.

I'd edit or delete this thread and send in a support ticket. If you can offer proof of your innocence in a less-incendiary thread, perhaps some forum support will help you get heard.

Logs or gtfo, salty child.

From your attitude, i can guess why you got banned.

you also get emailed logs and in-client logs, if you dont want to accept that your behavior got you banned, you will probably eventually end up in jail some day. Enjoy the ride.

That's a little excessive don't you think ^^"
The OP wrote that he got banned for _cheating_ not chat... though the content above does lead to that having been a possibility someday...

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} 
Just waiting to see where this cancerous post goes.

First off: this attitude of yours (yelling, screaming and cussing out Riot) is not gonna get you the answers that you seek, so I would suggest calming down and try asking again in a more mature and respectful manner.

Second off: Riot doesn't release exact details on third party bans to prevent people from trying to use it to game the system. That said, if you keep responding to the Support Ticket (assuming that you've made one already) and keep a calm, level and professional head about it then chances are you'll get more answers to your question than you would by yelling, screaming and cussing out Riot, as people are more inclined to help those with a good attitude than those with a bad attitude.

May I ask what exactly happened?
Is the account you're posting from the one that was banned or did you "acquire" another account (that was likely botted to 30 by a scrub somewhere).
There are different reasons for bans, and your ban code (the year you are banned until) will tell you what that reason is when you google it.
Another salty ex-Leaguer who didnt read the ToS bit about NOT CHEATING and NO REFUNDS ON CONTENT
It doesn't appear like you want any help, just throwing insults at the only group that can assist you (riot).
I'm guessing you were banned for using 3rd party software or something, (Or so they think)?
If you think you were unjustly banned you can send in a support ticket.
